lines.text: All right, look, I haven't robbed a bank, I haven't killed anybody, and I'm not an international spy. Do you believe that?
You know, this is the first time in my life that a woman has locked me *inside* her apartment.
How come a German speaks such good English?

I've changed passports so often, I've lost touch. I was educated in England. My mother was a Czech, my father was a Pole. In those days, the Poles were Russians and the Czechs were Austrians. So you work it out.
If you've got anything to say to me, you'll come to me and say it!
You look different. Perhaps it's because we met in the dark.
